item.title: Start Jenkins on Fedora 20
item.description: Installing Jenkins on Fedora 20 is quite easy thanks to the available Red Hat packages, but I ran into problems when I tried to start Jenkins.

item.title: Get colorful ansible output in Jenkins
item.description: Working with ansible is enjoyable, but it’s a little bland when you use it with Jenkins.
